name: Free Browse
author: Ishaan Taylor
description: Free Browse is a chrome extension that takes keyboard commands and gestures and maps them to certain browsing functionalities.

switch_right.description: Switch highlighted tab to the right

switch_left.description: Switch highlighted tab to the left

move_tabs_right.description: Move highlighted tabs to the right

move_tabs_left.description: Move highlighted tabs to the left

highlight_right.description: Increase range of highlighted tabs to the right

highlight_left.description: Increase range of highlighted tabs to the left
